name: Keep Rollin!
description: Fun, original, arcade game. Move along the road and avoid obstacles. Try not to crash!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
